item.title: Google will now let you pick your top sources for search results
item.description: Google will let you define the top sources to get more stories from those sites.

item.title: Uber Freight CEO Lior Ron leaves to join self-driving startup Waabi as COO
item.description: Self-driving truck maker Waabi has hired autonomous vehicle industry veteran and Uber Freight CEO, Lior Ron, to step in as chief operating officer, as...

item.title: Australian court finds Apple, Google abused app store market power
item.description: Epic Games has just secured a win in its crusade against Apple and Google's app store policies: The Federal Court of Australia on Tuesday ruled that A...

item.title: How a once-tiny research lab helped Nvidia become a $4 trillion-dollar company
item.description: Nvidia's research lab developed the technology that took the company from a video game GPU startup to a $4 trillion-dollar company.

item.title: TDK backs Ultraviolette with $21M to take India-made electric motorcycles global
item.description: Ultraviolette aims to expand its electric motorcycles to 40 European countries, as well as Latin America and Southeast Asia.
